This images are uses for testing, they shouldn't be modified.

stripes.png                 Reference image. 8bpp, grayscale
stripes5.png                Same as stripes.png, but with small IDATs (5 bytes)
stripes0idat.png            Same as stripes.png, but with two zero-sized IDAT
bad_truncated.png           Invalid, lacks ending bytes
testg1badcrc.png            Bad CRC
stripes_extratrailing.png   Same as stripes.png with extra junk trailing bytes, valid.
testg1.png                  Small 8 bpp 9x11. See text comment for contents  
testg1i.png                 Same as testg1 but interlaced
testg1p.png                 Single pixel (1x1)
testg2i.png                 3x3 interlaced
